name: Carabao Capital Global Pte Ltd
description: Developer of an online financing platform designed to offer short-term loans to small and medium enterprises. The company's platform offers collateral-free short-term working capital and trade financing, enabling businesses to grow and improve the course of opportunity.
one_liner: Developer of an online financing platform designed to offer short-term loans to small and medium enterprises. The company's platform offers collateral-free short-term working capital and trade financing, enabling businesses to grow and improve the course of opportunity.
